alphabetsoup.simulators.greedytaskallocation
Class LetterManager

java.lang.Object
  alphabetsoup.simulators.greedytaskallocation.LetterManager
All Implemented Interfaces:
Updateable
public class LetterManager
extends java.lang.Object
implements Updateable

Basic simple implementation of a Letter Manager, which dispenses incoming letters to Letter stations as they have space. The Letter Manager notified when a new Word is assigned to a WordStation.

Author:
Chris Hazard

getNextEventTime

public double getNextEventTime(double cur_time)
Description copied from interface: Updateable
Gets the time of the earliest scheduled or possible event

Specified by:
getNextEventTime in interface Updateable
Parameters:
cur_time - the current system time
Returns:
the absolute time of the soonest possible event. Double.POSITIVE_INFINITY is valid return value if no events are scheduled, and no known collisions or pending events are known to happen.

newWordAssignedToStation

public void newWordAssignedToStation(WordStation s,
                                     Word w)
Called by the system when a new word has been assigned to a Wordstation. It is useful as it indicates what new letters need to be filled in the system (based on the word).

Parameters:
s - WordStation the Word was assigned to
w - Word assigned
